bibl.title: Brief Report on the 2007 Excavations at Ismant el-Kharab.
bibl.note: Dakhleh Oasis Project, 2007. - 1. The painted residence B/3/1 (Ist-IInd centuries and later). - 2. The pigeon loft B/3/2 (IIIrd-IVth centuries). - 3. A water feature A/11 (late IIIrd or early IVth century). - Concluding remarks.
bibl.seg: BOWEN Gillian E., Wendy DOLLING, Colin A. HOPE and Paul KUCERA, Brief Report on the 2007 Excavations at Ismant el-Kharab.

Dakhleh Oasis Project, 2007. - 1. The painted residence B/3/1 (Ist-IInd centuries and later). - 2. The pigeon loft B/3/2 (IIIrd-IVth centuries). - 3. A water feature A/11 (late IIIrd or early IVth century). - Concluding remarks.
